revised_title: Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen's Letters on the Discovery of X-Rays
tldr: This article presents two unpublished letters by Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen, discussing his discovery of X-rays. The letters provide insights into Röntgen's experiments, collaboration with other scientists, and the impact of his discovery on the scientific community. The letters also reveal Röntgen's modesty and his focus on the reliability and accuracy of his work.
